Texts.Chs: 晚餐和一场...闹剧？
Texts.Eng: Dinner and a... show?

Texts.Chs: 110% 的质量，25/8-这是我们的首要原则！来吧，大家一起来吧，来汉堡福吧！
Texts.Eng: 110% quality, 25/8 - that's our #1 rule! Come one, come all, to Burger Fool!

Texts.Chs: 有兴趣吃一顿美餐吗，我的陛下？
Texts.Eng: Can I interest you in a fine meal, my liege?

Texts.Chs: 来汉堡福用餐吧，我们做汉堡，你们即是主宰！
Texts.Eng: Come dine at Burger Fool, where we make burgers and you the rules!

Texts.Chs: 绝望。请给我们一个好评——不然我的经理会杀了我的...
Texts.Eng: Desperate. Please give us a good review - my manager will kill me...

Texts.Chs: 心烦意乱。当我每一句话都表达出我的厌恶时，我又怎么能提供高质量的客户服务呢？
Texts.Eng: Distraught. How am I supposed to give quality customer service when I voice my loathing with every sentence?

Texts.Chs: 尴尬。我仍然靠食品券生活，所以我只能靠这些来付房租。
Texts.Eng: Embarassed. I'm still living on food stamps, so this is all I've got to pay my rent.

Texts.Chs: 这是给你的东西，我相信你会喜欢的！
Texts.Eng: Here's something for your troubles, I'm sure you'd like it!

Texts.Chs: 当我每一句话都表达出我的厌恶时，我又怎么能提供高质量的客户服务呢？
Texts.Eng: How am I supposed to give quality customer service when I voice my loathing with every sentence?

Texts.Chs: 我仍然靠食品券生活，所以我只能靠这些来付房租。
Texts.Eng: I'm still living on food stamps, so this is all I've got to pay my rent.

Texts.Chs: 不真诚。有兴趣吃一顿美餐吗，我的陛下？
Texts.Eng: Insincere. Can I interest you in a fine meal, my liege?

Texts.Chs: 不真诚。这是给你的东西，我相信你会喜欢的！
Texts.Eng: Insincere. Here's something for your troubles, I'm sure you'd like it!

Texts.Chs: 易怒。不,老爷,我们没有免下船餐厅,非常抱歉。
Texts.Eng: Irritable. No, milord, we do not have a drive-through, my deepest apologies.

Texts.Chs: 不,老爷,我们没有免下船餐厅,非常抱歉。
Texts.Eng: No, milord, we do not have a drive-through, my deepest apologies.

Texts.Chs: 哦，老爷！这个卑微的傻瓜今天能为你做些什么呢？
Texts.Eng: Oh, milord! What can this humble fool do for you today?

Texts.Chs: 痛苦。哦，老爷！这个卑微的傻瓜今天能为你做些什么呢？
Texts.Eng: Pained. Oh, milord! What can this humble fool do for you today?

Texts.Chs: 请给我们一个好评——不然我的经理会杀了我的...
Texts.Eng: Please give us a good review - my manager will kill me...

Texts.Chs: 压力。来汉堡夫用餐吧，我们做汉堡，你们即是主宰！
Texts.Eng: Stressed. Come dine at Burger Fool, where we make burgers and you the rules!

Texts.Chs: 汉堡福
Texts.Eng: The Burger Fool

Texts.Chs: 疲倦。110% 的质量，25/8-这是我们的首要原则！来吧，大家一起来吧，来汉堡福吧！
Texts.Eng: Tired. 110% quality, 25/8 - that's our #1 rule! Come one, come all, to Burger Fool!

Texts.Chs: 疲倦。今天无限续杯,只需额外的25像素。
Texts.Eng: Tired. Unlimited refills today for just an extra 25 pixels.

Texts.Chs: 缺乏热情。今天无限续杯，只需额外的25像素!
Texts.Eng: Unenthused. Unlimited refills today, for just an extra 25 Pixels!

Texts.Chs: 无趣。欢迎来到汉堡福，在这里即使是傻瓜也能吃得像国王一样。
Texts.Eng: Uninterested. Welcome to Burger Fool, where even the fools eat like kings.

Texts.Chs: 今天无限续杯，只需额外的25像素。
Texts.Eng: Unlimited refills today for just an extra 25 Pixels.

Texts.Chs: 今天无限续杯，只需额外的25像素!
Texts.Eng: Unlimited refills today, for just an extra 25 Pixels!

Texts.Chs: 我们没有多余的像素，所以我希望你能有这个——它在某一天可能是一个收藏品！
Texts.Eng: We don't have Pixels to spare, so I hope you'd have this - it might be a collectible some day!

Texts.Chs: 欢迎来到汉堡福，在这里即使是傻瓜也能吃得像国王一样。
Texts.Eng: Welcome to Burger Fool, where even the fools eat like kings.

Texts.Chs: 焦虑。我们没有多余的像素，所以我希望你能有这个——它在某一天可能是一个收藏品！
Texts.Eng: Worried. We don't have Pixels to spare, so I hope you'd have this - it might be a collectible some day!
